name: Farther Forest
description:
Enemies and forest monsters filled the magical forest, people no longer extract wood and berries. You, a young student, will face the most difficult test, to clear the forest of enemies. With only a sword and a couple of magic elixirs in your hands, you have to go into the forest to solve this problem and destroy the enemies.

On your way you will meet many dangers, ranging from bandits to carnivorous plants. Travel through the forest, collect magic potions and try not to die! Can you become the hero this forest deserves?

Farther forest - is a 2D platform game with RPG elements. Kill different enemies with your weapons! Complete different tasks and deal with the monsters that stand in your way, and beware of deadly traps.

Game Features:
- Pixel graphics
- Lots of levels
- Good soundtrack
